ygData.subject: Re: Destruction CF (OOC to Gigan and Cyberwolf)
ygData.msgSnippet: I gave you a solid hit, That s more than most people would have done. if you want to aim for where the ribs would be then say so when you attack. I accept that

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

I gave you a solid hit, That's more than most people would have done. if you
want to aim for where the ribs would be then say so when you attack. I
accept that not every attack I make will turn out the way I want. you should
too.

As for the plasma blast if your character has time to raise a weapon then
why can't mine have time to knock it away?

BIC Lunarpine held his claws to the side to keep Serpentor from using them
with as much effect. He threw a front kick at Serpentors chest trying to
push him back. The wolfbot realised his mistake when a sudden stabbing pain
went through his right leg from the thigh down. He winced in pain from the
slash. (Results of the pain will depend on whether or not the kick
connects.)

?  I did!  The energy ball only
> touched his (Ares) foot and he shot off four bolts at Ice's chest is what
I
> responded with as well.

I went back through the posts and couldn't find your response. Don't worry
about sending it to me, I'll use this one.

Ice was hit hard by the first two bolts. The first in her right shoulder,
(Since she's coming at you in Polar bear mode she'd be on all fours.)
knocking her into a backwards roll. The second hit her in the upper right
side of the chest completing her roll. the next two flew over her as she lay
flat on her back. With her left paw she wiped her wounds revealing theat
she'd started bleeding. Ice hoped that her internal repair systems would
work the same in this form as it had in her former. She tried to focus her
telepathy on Ares to try and read her next move. The pain made it difficult
but she knew that she had to. "What would Lunarpine think if he saw me
laying here like some old drone?" she thought. That one thought gave her the
strength to arise. She got to her feet facing her opponent.

She read that Ares had turned his attention to missles heading toward
sixshot. She focused her thoughts and launched three more negative energy
charges at him.
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 10:17 AM
Subject: Destruction CF (OOC to Gigan and Cyberwolf)


> (Trike, the latest post I have from you attacking you is the 21st, and I
> responded to that.  Though, I don't receive all e-mails, because eGroups
kind
> of sucks, and it has happened before.
>
> Luna, side is obviously where ribs would be, not the thigh.  And it makes
a
> difference by the way.  If I hit you in the thigh, wow.  Hit you in the
side,
> it hurts more and does more damage.  And I never said it would take you
down,
> I'd be surprised it if took you down!  It's just you did something stupid
by
> charge like an idiot, and I took advantage of it.  I'm not whining, I'm
> telling you.  Post for the correct damage.  I'm getting tired of all the
> idiots out there that don't do that. By the way Serpentor shot the plasma
> launcher off at Luna's chest.
>
> Why haven't I responded to Ice's attack?  I did!  The energy ball only
> touched his foot and he shot off four bolts at Ice's chest is what I
> responded with as well.  You want me to forward you the e-mail?)
>
>
> L. Unitron
> KSLawDogg@...
>
>
>
